Downloading data
```{r}
m <- curl("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/brennastallings/SpatialAnalysisModule/master/Example_Data_Clumped")
n <- read.csv(m, header = TRUE, sep = ",", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
n
```

